Sentence.sentence: My own research at the Stanford Center on Adolescence uses in-depth interviews with small samples of youngsters rather than large-scale surveys.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Interviews with students find many of them are only concerned about personal matters.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In those essays, and in follow-up interviews with a few of the teenagers, we found lots of insight, positive feeling and inspirational thinking.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In our interviews, many students viewed politics with suspicion and distaste.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In an interview with the Paris Review Hughes speculated that when a person puts pen to paper, "you meet the terrible resistance of what happened your first year at it, when you couldn't write at all".
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A few months later, I read an interview with the well-known cutting-edge designer Philippe Starck.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I have to do an interview for the evening news about a man with dozens of cats.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Only four out of the 54 people interviewed had completely broken with their sisters and brothers and only one of the four felt comfortable with the break.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Most of the elderly people he interviewed said they had supportive and friendly dealings and got along well or very well with their sisters and brothers
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: of those she interviewed said that contact with their sisters and brothers increase innate adulthood.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He is soon going to have an evaluation interview with his supervisor and the personnel director to discuss the work he has done in the past year.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In an interview last year with The Economist, George Whitesides, chief executive of space-tourism firm virgin Galactic, was placing his company in the latter category.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In fact, almost every interview I've ever had was due to a connection—one that I've gained through pure determination, not a school brand.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In one study, researchers interview 955 people involved in traffic accidents, the majority of them reported having daydream just before the accident.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

stems_affixes.word_buile: view看,查→观察, 观看→风景
inter在……之间+view看,查→n.&v.接见, 会见
sur在……上面+vey=view看,查→在上面看,从上往下看→俯瞰→测量,调查
view看,查→观察, 观看→风景

Sentence.sentence: A safe number of interviews to conduct is about six to ten.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: But with these tips, your first man-on-the-street interview experience can be easy.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Each interview that you get on the street shouldn't be longer than ten minutes.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: He interviews customers at the bar.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: I think the interview went very well.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: If one is late for a job interview, it is not likely that he will get the job.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'm glad to be here for the interview.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: In order to impress at a job interview, you need to bond with the interviewer right away.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 任务型读写 原文

Sentence.sentence: Interviews were repeated at ages 25, 31 and 47.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Make sure that as you go from interview to interview, you are getting a variety of answers.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: That number of interviews should give you all the answers you need.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: The man-on-the-street interview is an interview in which a reporter hits the streets with a cameraman to interview people on the sport.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: The reason I'm calling is that we'd like to offer you the position you were interviewed for last thursday.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: When your boss or professor sends you out to do man-on-the-street interviews for a story, think about the topic and develop a list of about ten general questions relating to it.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: In theory, the success of an applicant should not depend on the few others chosen randomly for interview during the same day, but Dr Simonsohn suspected the truth was otherwise.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Neuroscientist Bonnie Augeung found that the hormone oxytocin increased the amount of eye contact from men toward the interviewer during a brief interview when the direction of their gaze was recorded.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 面谈，(对求职者等的)面试，谋职面试；口头审查

sentences.en: The matter can't be discussed except at a personal interview.
sentences.cn: 这件事只能在面谈时讨论。

sentences.en: Don't be late for your job interview.
sentences.cn: 求职面试不能迟到。

sentences.en: If you sense that the interview is coming to and end, be ready with your queries.
sentences.cn: 当你感觉到面试接近尾声，你得准备好你的疑问。

means.word_mean: 采访, 交谈, 访谈

sentences.en: I never accept interviews.
sentences.cn: 我从不接受采访。

means.word_mean: 会谈, 会见, （私下的）面谈, 会谈, 晤谈

sentences.en: The manager has an interview with us.
sentences.cn: 经理会见了我们。

means.word_mean: 被接见者；被会见者；被采访者

sentences.en: I'm interviewing all this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 整个下午, 我都要进行面试。

sentences.en: We interviewed 8 people for the job.
sentences.cn: 我们对谋求这份工作的八个人进行了面试。

means.word_mean: 采访; 访问; 会见; （私下）提问, 面谈

sentences.en: I interviewed him about some things.
sentences.cn: 就一些事情我采访了他。

data.mean: 对（某人）进行面试（或面谈）

sentence.cn: 为了在面试中给人留下深刻印象，你需要马上和面试官联系。
sentence.en: In order to impress at a job interview, you need to bond with the interviewer right away.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 任务型读写 原文

sentence.cn: 当你的老板或教授让你为一个故事做街头采访时，考虑一下这个话题，然后列出一个大约10个与之相关的一般性问题。
sentence.en: When your boss or professor sends you out to do man-on-the-street interviews for a story,  think about the topic and develop a list of about ten general questions relating to it.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

entry.def: An interview is a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out if they are suitable for a job or a course of study.

example.ex: When I went for my first interview for this job I arrived extremely early...
example.tran: 在参加这份工作的初次面试时,我到得非常早。

entry.def: If you are interviewed for a particular job or course of study, someone asks you questions about yourself to find out if you suitable for it.

example.ex: When Wardell was interviewed, he was impressive, and on that basis, he was hired...
example.tran: 沃德尔参加面试的时候给人留下了深刻印象,所以基于这点,他被雇用了。

example.ex: He was among the three candidates interviewed for the job.
example.tran: 他是3个来参加求职面试的人选之一。

entry.def: An interview is a conversation in which a journalist puts questions to someone such as a famous person or politician.

example.ex: Allan gave an interview to the Chicago Tribune newspaper last month...
example.tran: 艾伦上个月接受了《芝加哥论坛报》的采访。

example.ex: There'll be an interview with Mr Brown after the news.
example.tran: 新闻过后播出的是对布朗先生的访谈。

entry.def: When a journalist interviews someone such as a famous person, they ask them a series of questions.

example.ex: I seized the chance to interview Chris Hani about this issue.
example.tran: 我抓住机会就这一问题采访了克里斯·哈尼。

entry.def: When the police interview someone, they ask them questions about a crime that has been committed.

example.ex: The police interviewed the driver, but had no evidence to go on.
example.tran: 警方讯问了司机,但是没有获得什么有用的证据。

means.word_mean: 1. the questioning of a person (or a conversation in which information is elicited); often conducted by journalists;

sentences.sentence: "my interviews with teen-agers revealed a weakening of religious bonds"
"he had a consultation with the judge"
"he requested an audience with the king"

means.word_mean: 1. conduct an interview in television, newspaper, and radio reporting
2. discuss formally with (somebody) for the purpose of an evaluation;
3. go for an interview in the hope of being hired;

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (formerly also as enterview): from French entrevue, from s'entrevoir 'see each other', from voir 'to see', on the pattern of vue 'a view'

sentences.cn: 如果面试时表现不好，你很可能不会得到这份工作。

sentences.en: I think I fared quite well in the interview.

sentences.cn: 凭一封介绍信准保会接待你.
sentences.en: A letter of introduction will ensure you an interview.

sentences.cn: 他将接见代表团.
sentences.en: He will give an interview to the delegation.

sentences.cn: 他简短地说接见结束了.
sentences.en: He indicated that the interview was over.

sentences.cn: 他要求总理(同意)接见(他-次).
sentences.en: He requested that the Premier grant him an interview.

sentences.cn: 倘蒙阁下接见,将不胜感激.
sentences.en: I shall be obliged if you will give me a personal interview at your convenience.

sentences.cn: 新临床的蔓叶花样让你在行动过程中看见精神病学的接见的基本的组成部分.
sentences.en: New Clinical Vignettes let you see the basic components of the psychiatric interview in action.

sentences.cn: 我们将会接见超过60位新申请人,并进行面试.
sentences.en: We will be orienting and interviewing more than 60 new candidates.

sentences.cn: 如蒙接见,将甚感荣幸.
sentences.en: I shall esteem it as an honour if you kindly grant me an interview.

sentences.cn: 当他被分配接见礼物的时候, 他在他的胃中有了蝴蝶.
sentences.en: When he was assigned to interview the Present, he had butterflies in his stomach.

sentences.cn: 他坚决要求负责同志亲自接见他.
sentences.en: He demanded a personal interview with the comrade in charge.

sentences.cn: 人力资源部长接见了他并把观看他扫地当作考试内容.
sentences.en: The HR manager interviewed him then watched him floor as a test.

sentences.cn: 精神病学的接见是进你的病患的心的你的窗子.
sentences.en: The psychiatric interview is your window into the mind of your patient.

sentences.cn: 如贵公司愿意接见,我随时侯教.
sentences.en: I would be pleased if you would grant me an interview at you convenience.

sentences.cn: 事故发生后,警方接见了几个现场旁观者.
sentences.en: Police interviewed several bystanders after the accident.

sentences.cn: 你在等着人家接见的时候,千万不要懒洋洋的,不要嚼口香糖,不要抽烟.
sentences.en: And be sure to slouch or chew gum or smoke while you're waiting for your interview.

sentences.cn: 经理将按(到达)先后次序接见这些应征者.
sentences.en: The manager will interview the candidates in order of arrival.

sentences.cn: 为了理解使精神病学的接见为你的桥.
sentences.en: Make The Psychiatric Interview your bridge to understanding.

sentences.en: In the study next door, my brother was interviewing a pupil.

sentences.cn: 敬希阁下抽空惠予接见.
sentences.en: I hope that you will give me an interview at some time convenient to you.

sentences.cn: 就职典礼进行顺利; 你的接见进行得 怎么样 ?
sentences.en: The inauguration went well; how did your interview go?

sentences.en: The minister granted journalists an interview.

sentences.cn: 我十分感谢您这次接见.
sentences.en: I thank you very much indeed for this interview.

sentences.cn: 应征者将按到达先后次序被接见.
sentences.en: The candidates will be interviewed in order of arrival.

sentences.cn: 几乎所有接受过这个特别报道采访的人都说，目前最大的问题不是没有需求， 而是缺乏可以出售的好作品。
sentences.en: Almost everyone who was interviewed for this special report said that the biggest problem at the moment is not a lack of demand but a lack of good work to sell.

sentences.cn: 社会学家凯瑟琳·里斯曼也在她的新书《夫妻对话》中提到，大多数接受采访的女性都认为她们离婚的原因是缺乏交流沟通，而只有少数男性持相同观点。
sentences.en: Sociologist Catherine Kohler Riessman reports in her new book Divorce Talk that most of the women she interviewed — but only a few of the men — gave lack of communication as the reason for their divorces.

sentences.cn: 社会学家凯瑟琳·里斯曼也在她的新书《夫妻对话》中提到，大多数接受采访的女性都认为她们离婚的原因是缺乏交流沟通，而只有少数男性持相同观点。
sentences.en: Sociologist Catherine Kohler Riessman reports in her new book Divorce Talk that most of the women she interviewed — but only a few of the men — gave lack of communication as the reason for their divorces.

sentences.cn: 派尔采访过的一些士兵在影片中本色出演。
sentences.en: Some of the soldiers Pyle interviewed portrayed themselves in the film.

sentences.cn: 在我们的采访中，许多学生对政治充满怀疑和厌恶。
sentences.en: In our interviews, many students viewed politics with suspicion and distaste.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 嗯，这项调查是由一家人力资源咨询公司完成的，这家公司共采访了一千多名职工，列出了让人们在工作中感到快乐的前10 个因素。
sentences.en: Well, this was done by a human resources consultancy, who interviewed more than 1,000 workers, and established a top ten of the factors which make people happy at work
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 当然，我采访过的这些HSAM 者们都认为，这种能力好坏参半。
sentences.en: The people with HSAM I’ve interviewed would certainly agree that it can be a mixed blessing.

sentences.en: The interview went well...

sentences.cn: 他是3个来参加求职面试的人选之一。

sentences.cn: 理论上来说，申请者的成功不应取决于当天随机抽选参加面试的其他几名申请者，但是，西蒙逊博士怀疑事实并非如此。
sentences.en: In theory, the success of an applicant should not depend on the few others chosen randomly for interview during the same day, but Dr Simonsohn suspected the truth was otherwise.

sentences.cn: 他研究了由31名面试官进行的9323场MBA面试的结果。
